code: import React from'react';import{Card,Button,Container}from'semantic-ui-react';import faker from'faker';import TutorialCard from'./TutorialCard';import'../styles/FeaturedTutorials.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const tutorials=Array.from({length:3},()=>({title:faker.lorem.sentence(),description:faker.lorem.paragraph(),author:faker.name.findName(),rating:faker.datatype.number({min:4,max:5})}));const FeaturedTutorials=()=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{fluid:true,className:"featured-tutorials",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Featured Tutorials"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tutorials-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Group,{className:"card-group",children:tutorials.map((tutorial,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TutorialCard,{tutorial:tutorial},index))})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"button-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{children:"See all tutorials"})})]});export default FeaturedTutorials;
